creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Twelve Bouts in the Way of Love (Shikidō torikumi jūniban 色道取組十二番)
text: A woman tries to continue working on writing a letter while her lover carries on from behind. She closes her eyes in concentration and exclaims: Ah I am coming already, I am coming...
title: Writing a Letter, No. 8 from Twelve Bouts in the Way of Love (Shikidō torikumi jūniban)
